usuarioNaoEhGestor = BennerContext.Security.GetLoggedUserHandle() != entity.Fields["GESTORPROJETO"].Handle
if (entity.Fields["STATUS"].Value != 1) and (row.DeleteCommand != None): row.DeleteCommand.Visible = False if (entity.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 3) and (row.EditCommand != None) : row.EditCommand.Visible = False
if (row.DeleteCommand != None) and(usuarioNaoEhGestor): row.DeleteCommand.Visible = False if (row.EditCommand != None) and(usuarioNaoEhGestor): row.EditCommand.Visible = False
if(row.GetCustomCommand("CMD_APROVAR") != None and row.GetCustomCommand("CMD_RECUSAR") != None): emAprovacao = GPProjetos.PermissaoConfirmarRecusar(entity.Fields["HANDLE"].Value) row.GetCustomCommand("CMD_APROVAR").Enabled = emAprovacao row.GetCustomCommand("CMD_RECUSAR").Enabled = emAprovacao
